review: Great little device, but I have to pull the power cord out of the surge protector every so often (i.e. every other day).  The unit locks up and becomes unresponsive, so a power cycle is the only way to get it back up and running again.  Otherwise, this little device is awesome and I can't wait to cut the cord (or satellite) with DirecTV and use more features.  Maybe an update will come out that will fix this issue.
